cards.rules_text: High-Handed One has menace as long as it's enchanted.

Deathtouch

• Return target creature card or Aura card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Target opponent discards a card.

Flying
Whenever Sky Stealer enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, return target creature or Aura card from your graveyard to your hand.
Seekers of Qirauz can't be blocked by enchanted creatures.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Dreams of bone fragments danced into being. The seekers combed Quyrash's mind, searching for Eternity's Horizon, heedless of the risk their disturbance could pose.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Enchant player

Nightmares may attack enchanted player as though they had haste.

Enchant creature

cards.flavor_text: [i]Here and gone without the blink of an eye.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Panoptic Aggressor has first strike as long as you've drawn two or more cards this turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]It sees you when you're sleeping. It sees when you're awake.[/i]

cards.rules_text: {2}{R}, Discard a card: Draw a card. This ability costs {1} less if you control another creature with haste and {1} less if you control another creature with menace.

cards.flavor_text: [i]Some Dreams have dwelt long enough in Quyrash to read its ebbs and flows, predicting the tides of the dreamer's mind.[/i]

cards.flavor_text: [i]“Lursk plays to survive; I play to [/i]live[i].”[/i]

cards.flavor_text: [i]Through Doubt's Reach, under the Skysea, over the peaks of Mount Dreadnight, he fights in the Golden King's name.[/i]

{W}{U} DREAMS Such things as dreams are made of—Summon Dreams to war and prosper.
{U}{B} CURSES Your foe's misfortune is your fortune. Curse your opponent to suffer.
{B}{R} NIGHTMARES Cast an army of your opponent's worst fears and rally to victory.
{R}{G} AGGRO SUBSTANTIATE Your Auras don't even need a target to hit hard, so hit the ground running while your foe is still building.
{G}{W} INSTILL Your army can help you call down bigger spells. Go wide and hit hard.
{W}{B} EXILE Reach beyond existence and draw strength from the exile zone.
{U}{R} CARD DRAW Knowledge is power. Draw more, do more, win more.
{B}{G} MIDRANGE SUBSTANTIATE Your Auras and creatures can outlast and outlive your foe. Be the last one standing.
{R}{W} KEYWORDS Muster a trained force of able creatures and benefit from their varied skills.
{G}{U} ABSTRACTION Trade in the memories of spells in your graveyard for new cards and never be short of something to do.

cards.rules_text:
Enchant instant card in a graveyard
Whenever you cast a sorcery spell, copy the enchanted instant card. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. If you do, exile the enchanted card and attach Spellweaver Volute to another instant card in a graveyard.

Enchant creature card in a graveyard
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a token that's a copy of the enchanted creature card. If you do, exile the enchanted card and attach Fleshweaver Volute to another creature card in a graveyard.
